Mobius Strip



Made from strips of veneer and carefully finished to give the appearance of seamlessness.
Taken Wednesday, August 11, 2010, 08:52:08AM. Original image size: 3803x2139, 1.7Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/30s@ F5.6, ISO 1250, 17-85mm f/4-5.6 IS, 44mm (70mm equiv)
PS CS4 Exp1 Sat10, Crop, USM 40:5
